content.question: Which of the following is accurate about late-nineteenth-century Socialist parties in western and central Europe?

choices.label: They included members who emphasized electoral success and participation in government.
They were effectively controlled by the First International.
They repudiated labor unions as supportive of a labor aristocracy and not of the mass of working people.

content.answer: They included members who emphasized electoral success and participation in government.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
